tool_description: Email Validation Service. Use ZeroBounce's email validation API to increase your email marketing ROI! Remove invalid email addresses from your list using our unique email verification scrubbing system to prevent email bounces.
title: ZeroBounce

api_list.name: Activity Data
api_list.description: Our Activity Data feature allows you to gather insights into your subscribersâ€™ overall email engagement. The tool returns data regarding opens, clicks, forwards and unsubscribes that have taken place in the past 30, 90, 180 or 365 days. Thus, you can improve your targeting and personalization, and run more successful email campaigns.

required_parameters.name: api_key
required_parameters.description: Your API Key, found in your account.

required_parameters.name: email
required_parameters.description: The email address you want to check activity for

optional_parameters.name: ip_address
optional_parameters.description: The IP Address of where the Email signed up from - You can pass in blank

required_parameters.description: The IP Address the email signed up from (Can be blank, but parameter required)

required_parameters.description: The email address you want to validate
